message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $160. I believe this product is well worth that price.
I'm still interested in the product, but $160 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway.
